name: NumFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask number facts to tell me facts about 7”
”Alexa, ask number facts what is interesting about 42”
”Alexa, load number facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: number facts
des:
NumFacts allows its user to ask Alexa about any number it wishes to know about. For example, "Tell me something about 7". NumFacts then fetches a unique characteristics about the number (in this case 7) and narrates it to the user. 

This functionality requires absolutely no prior knowledge other than which number the user wants to know about. All the user needs to do is ask Alexa about any number, at any time, and NumFatcts will fetch an answer for it. The kind of answers given by NumFacts are simple and engaging and the user can keep asking NumFacts for facts on any number till whenever he/she wants to stop. NumFacts fetches new data and facts about all numbers regularly so that the user can get a dynamic and nonrepetitive experience.

If the user has an issue understanding the concept of NumFacts, he/she can just ask Alexa to elaborate and NumFacts will do the needful.

This is how NumFacts provides a unique and refreshing way for users to build their general knowledge about number more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
